title: (x) "Golden Cap" cider logo font - custom designed {Yves}
content:
Two other sign font foundries, besides Letterhead, are [SignDNA](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142746/http:/www.signdna.com/v1/index.html) and [Art & Sign Studio's Signfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142746/http:/artandsignstudio.com/fonts.html)   
   
If your sample is a font that I have collected it would be shown in Part 7 of my [Script font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142746/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html), but it doesn't look familiar.
author: bowfinpw
